short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some missing features to make timesheets easier to fill in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fieldglass Helper adds the following shortcuts for each week:
- [7:30 every working day] - fill in a whole week with one click
- [0:00 every day] - reset a whole week in one go

... and adds these shortcuts for each day:
- [7:30] - full day
- [3:45] - half day
- [0:00] - Not worked

Please note: this extension has been developed and tested independently.
It is not an official SAP Fieldglass extension.
I wrote it to speed up my own timesheets and am sharing it in case it makes anyone else's life slightly easier.

Although this extension has been extensively tested, please check your timesheets before submitting them. I cannot accept any liability for problems due to you submitting incorrect timesheets whilst using this extension.
If you have any feature requests or find any issues, please log them here: https://github.com/floodmeadows/fieldglass-chrome-extension/issues
